title: Ep. 318: The Wolf Cut & The Week’s Beauty News
itunes:title: Ep. 318: The Wolf Cut & The Week’s Beauty News
itunes:subtitle: We take a closer look at the haircut that’s everywhere this summer and chat about its origins, what makes a haircut go viral, and whether or not it’s safe to call the wolf cut “Gen Z’s answer to the mullet.” Before that, there’s lots of beauty news to ...
description:
We take a closer look at the haircut that’s everywhere this summer and chat about its origins, what makes a haircut go viral, and whether or not it’s safe to call the wolf cut “Gen Z’s answer to the mullet.” Before that, there’s lots of beauty news to discuss: details on the new Glossier retail locations; the temporary shutdown of KKW Beauty; Tracee Ellis Ross’s docuseries, The Hair Tales; NYC Cosmetics sponsoring e-gamers; and more. Plus: A new study shows how quickly hair can go gray due to stress and why the process may be reversible, and a listener shares her favorite “summer” moisturizer. -- For links, products, and sponsors mentioned in this episode: fatmascara.com/blog;To shop the products: myshlf.us/fatmascara; Our private Facebook Group: Fat Mascara Raising a Wand; Instagram: @fatmascara, @jessicamatlin, @jenn_edit; Email: info@fatmascara.com; To submit a "Raise A Wand" product recommendation & be featured on a future episode: 646-481-8182.

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/fatmascara.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
